channel.title: CVE Feed for discourse -- discourse-yearly-review
channel.description: The latest CVEs for discourse -- discourse-yearly-review

item.title: CVE-2023-25169|2023-03-06T17:40:45.721Z -- discourse -- discourse-yearly-review
item.description: discourse-yearly-review is a discourse plugin which publishes an automated Year in Review topic. In affected versions a user present in a yearly review topic that is then anonymised will still have some data linked to its original account. This issue has been patched in commit `b3ab33bbf7` which is included in the latest version of the Discourse Yearly Review plugin. Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade may disable the `yearly_review_enabled` setting to fully mitigate the issue. Also, it's possible to edit the anonymised user's old data in the yearly review topics manually.
